metadata.name: Cybernasi
metadata.description:
Kedar and Bholu find themselves in the Metaverse in Varanasi in 2099, ☸️ Varanasi is an ancient city in India. ☸️

You play as "Kedar" who is here to solve the riddles.

Solving the riddles allows you to move to the next space in the metaverse


Riddles: -
https://saahil13sharma.wixsite.com/kedarthesage
